message_1:
Suppose a company wants to analyze the relationship between the following variables: age, income, education level, and job satisfaction. The company conducts a factor analysis and obtains the following component matrix: 

|â€‹       | Component 1 | Component 2 | Component 3 | Component 4 |
|-------|-------------|-------------|-------------|-------------|
| Age   | 0.75        | -0.30       | 0.10        | 0.40        |
| Income| 0.10        | 0.80        | 0.20        | -0.05       |
|Education level| -0.10 | -0.20       | 0.90        | 0.05        |
|Job satisfaction|0.20 | 0.25         | 0.10        | 0.85        |

What is the correlation between Component 1 and age?
message_2: The correlation between Component 1 and age is 0.75.
